title: Lucretius his six books of epicurean philosophy and Manilius his five books containing a system of the ancient astronomy and astrology together with The philosophy of the Stoicks / both translated into English verse with notes by Mr. Tho. Creech;  To which is added the several parts of Lucretius, English'd by Mr. Dryden.
author: Lucretius Carus, Titus.
publisher: Printed and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,
